definitions: the panel facing the driver of a vehicle or the pilot of an aircraft, containing instruments and controls

examples.text: Scott looked at the clock on the dashboard

shortDefinitions: panel facing driver of vehicle or pilot of aircraft

definitions: a graphical summary of various pieces of important information, typically used to give an overview of a business

examples.text: an executive dashboard enables a CEO to see bank balances, the top five customers, accounts receivable, and accounts payable

shortDefinitions: screen providing graphical summary of important information

definitions: a home page on a website giving access to different elements of the site's functionality

examples.text: the main line graph in the dashboard shows daily traffic to our side over the past 30 days

shortDefinitions: home page on website providing summary of important information and access to elements of site's functionality

definitions: a board of wood or leather in front of a carriage, to keep out mud.
shortDefinitions: board of wood or leather in front of carriage
